---
title: "Overview"
---

## High-level description
This JSON file, located in the `.vscode` directory, specifies recommended extensions for Visual Studio Code. It suggests the "Resource Monitor" extension by MutantDino for users of this project.

## Symbols

### recommendations
#### Description
An array containing the identifiers of recommended Visual Studio Code extensions for this project.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| - | array | A list of extension identifiers |

#### Outputs
N/A (This is a configuration file)

## Dependencies
| Dependency | Purpose |
|:-----------|:--------|
| mutantdino.resourcemonitor | Resource Monitor extension for Visual Studio Code |

## Configuration
This file configures the recommended extensions for the Visual Studio Code workspace.

| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| recommendations | array | ["mutantdino.resourcemonitor"] | List of recommended VS Code extension identifiers |

Note: This configuration suggests the Resource Monitor extension to be installed by users working on this project in Visual Studio Code.
